* Note:

1/ Please sign your name to confirm the weight, measurement, cargo's status before delivery of cargo to the CFS warehouse. We will not be responsible for any claim in furture duet to lack of your confirmation.

2/ Shipments to USA, Canada, Australia, Europ Mariana Island destinations, cargo packed in wooden/ Straw material of from wooden origin must be fumigated under IPPC standard before on board.

3/ We do not accept hazardous cargo, seed, exhibition cargo, re-export cargoes unless confirmed by NPV before on board.

4/ We do not accept footstuff cargo.

5/ Please attached/ stick or write the shipping mark to surface of all crate, carton, case. Shipper will hold responsible for any problem occured during journey of the shipment due to missing or lack of shipping mark

6/ Please inform NPV before vessel's departure of any discrepancy in this Booking note. If not, it will be treated as the same as the correct one.

7/ In order to help NPV to handle smoothly your shipment, please leave he export Customs Declaration form to our person in charge
